bug.author: CedricProfessionnel
bug.summary: The app crash on next for time series
bug.description:
This is the bug <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74309042/104193785-7bd7e380-53ee-11eb-9c00-63d6e2dbfd85.png></denchmark-link>
Steps to Reproduce?
Open the app and import a time series with 1 or 2 samples (they both have the same behavior)
go to the samples list
click on the first sample
click on next
